product_name: Switch H-Wall SweptBack Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses
long_description: Named for a steep, mogul-strewn black diamond ski run in Tahoe, the Switch H-Wall SweptBack polarized sunglasses help you navigate mountain terrain when light conditions make it tricky.
short_description: Named for a steep, mogul-strewn black diamond ski run in Tahoe, the Switch H-Wall SweptBack polarized sunglasses help you navigate mountain terrain when light conditions make it tricky.
